name: 高級寫作（二）
restrict: ◎限大三修習◎必須先修過【ENU0287  中級寫作（一）】、【ENU0288  中級寫作（二）】、【ENU0289  高級寫作（一）】
description: 在「高級寫作」中，該課程旨在將學生在前兩年學到的寫作技巧，與他們對某個主題、學科或主題的知識相結合，以便為學生未來的職業生涯做好準備。本課程將使用不同類型、富有創意的文體，在不同領域進行情境化的寫作，內容可能包括與考試相關、與工作相關、或與研究論文相關的主題。以文字為主的寫作，也可能搭配其他的傳播管道，例如圖片、音頻、或個人/小組網頁等來進行。
goals: To help students rehearse skills in various modes of writing
Help students build a good sense of the difference between smart, sophisticated, quality writing and bland, hackneyed writing
Students are expected to integrate writing techniques with their knowledge of the topic/subject
syllabus:
**Course Description** 

The goal of this course is to help students write and think critically about contemporary social issues such as media violence, affirmative action and euthanasia. Through writing assignments and in-class discussions of selected works, as well as individual consultations with the instructor, the course provides the practice students need in honing essential critical thinking and writing skills.

**Required Text**

A course reader compiled by the instructor

(optional) _An Element of Style_, by E.B. White  

**Course Requirements**

     --Three essays (D/R) + one written commentary (60%)

      --Quiz 1 & 2 (10% each)

      --Attendance/Participation (20%)

**Attendance Policy**

Regular class attendance is vital to academic success. Three unexcused absences will result in a failing grade. If for any reason you can't attend a class session, please inform the instructor with a short email beforehand.
